title: Session Analysis Complete: Comprehensive Security Remediation Documentation
description: Successfully completed full session analysis and documentation in Knowledge Graph. Logged 18 issues/solutions from our comprehensive security remediation session including: 4 critical security vulnerabilities, 3 high-priority issues, 6 medium-priority challenges, and 5 solution documentation entries. All problems and their solutions are now preserved for future Claude Code sessions. Validated Knowledge Graph query system works correctly with 12 related entries found when querying for hardcoded credentials security.
